text: 2:17 Filipai 2:7; Hibru 2:14; 4:15; 5:1-2; 1 Jon 2:2; 4:10Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a uan doziba ko buaramizibar mɨraram oto. A kamaghsua, a men Ofa Gamir Gumazibar Dapanimɨn ikɨ, egh Godɨn akamɨn gɨn mangɨ apangkuvim gumazamizibar ikɨva Godɨn ingangarim damu, egh ingangarir kamɨn gumazamizibar arazir kuraba gɨn amangam. Kamaghɨn a gumazamizibar mɨn oto.
